Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to the retirement of Nassau county 911 operators and fire techs
Summary: Relates to the retirement of Nassau county 911 operators; provides an optional twenty-five year retirement plan for the positions of county police communications operator, police communications operator supervisor, assistant bureau director (police 911 communications), bureau director (police 911 communications), fire tech I, fire tech II and fire tech III in the county of Nassau.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to the retirement of Nassau county 911 operators and fire techs
